title: Lemon Yoghurt Cake
ingredients:
1 cup sugar

2 eggs
The zest of 2 lemons
Juice of 1 lemon or 1/2 if itâ€™s a particularly juicy one. 
3/4 cup oil ( I use olive oil)
1 cup natural yoghurt (although I have also used Greek yoghurt) 
2 cups SR flour
method:
1. Mix sugar, zest, oil and eggs in a bowl with a fork till smooth.
2. Add the remaining ingredients and mix until combined. 
3. Pour into a greased ring tin - I use a 22cm diameter tin. 
Bake 35 minutes or until baked in centre. 
Ice with lemon icing of your choice.
